titleStmt.title: The manifold miseries of civill vvarre and discord in a kingdome by the examples of Germany, France, Ireland, and other places : vvith some memorable examples of Gods iusitice in punishing the authors and causes of rebellion and treason / by H. P.
titleStmt.author: Parker, Henry, 1604-1652.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Henry Parker. Cf. BLC.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
